German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

ab- +‎ holen

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈʔaphoːln̩/, /ˈʔaphoːlən/
  • Hyphenation: ab‧ho‧len
  • audio (Austria)
    		(file)

Verb[edit]

abholen (third-person singular simple present holt ab, past tense holte ab, past participle abgeholt, auxiliary haben)

  1. to collect, pick up or fetch someone or something

imperativehol ab (du)
hole ab (du)		holt ab (ihr)
